name: Stupid Camera
description:
It's an endless run game, a very simple game.

In the game, the player's goal is to run many distances and reach the final score.

With simple game manipulation, players can control using their own keyboard.

The overall way the game is played is so novel that it leaves little reaction time. You should always be ready. But there's something that's disturbing the player, so that's the camera.

So the title of the game is "stupid camera"
